## 6. Shareholding of the Promoters of our Company
As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Promoters hold 1,52,60,037 Equity Shares, representing 96.92% of the pre-Issue, subscribed and paid-up Equity Share capital of our Company.
Set forth below are the details of the build-up of shareholding of our Promoters:
### Details of build-up of shareholding of the Promoters:
